subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Magic trailed the Celtics for just 36 seconds on Sunday night as they earned the right to play LeBron James and the Cavaliers for a spot in the N.B.A. finals.
snippet: The Magic trailed the Celtics for just 36 seconds on Sunday night as they earned the right to play LeBron James and the Cavaliers for a spot in the N.B.A. finals.
